topics.body:
I gave up on structured writing though [spoiler]I am not insane, nor will I be. I'm just some jocular jester who likes to caress jars of jelly and rape sewer rats (naughty things they are, yes?). If someone said that I was as moonstruck as a fruitcake, I would hang them by their necking ties. Tying necks. Neck... n e  c   k   t     i      e       s? Or I suppose I would. 
If someone called me sane without that 'in' part, I ought to just shovel the smart bug right from their cage and watch them go mad.
Ah, yes, it's great being insane. It makes more sense than two plus two equalling four, but I digress. I digress to make progress and regress to be recognizant of that sewer rat I mentioned earlier. Fine fellow he was. He was a monster. A big one like whatever 'r' word I just said, recognizant. His name was like 'feels', but numb. Eels. I love and loved that six foot tall creep. I remember the zeroith time we met. I was in a flowerzy fieldzy and apparently he had come along to smell the roses or me; I guess. I paused where the yellow heads had risen to mock me and bent down to get my revenge. Eels was way over yonder. Making gales with his mouth. I heard the panting, but I closed my ears, figuring it was just some gang-fight between insects. It was then, I heard a ghost. Now this startled my thinking jelly. I jerked my head a near one-eighty. Apparently he had 'mated with the pretties', well 'raped the pretties'. And by pretties, I mean that unfortunate orange-furred ruffian. He posed tall above the reddened, whitened shredded character, with his *mumbles* knotty and pink, with a touch of snow. It was strange, not stranger than my eye... I.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 37e5b9d66361642500af5e00
